privacy-data.description: We may collect the following types of personal data from you:
list_item: Identity Information: Name and/or other information to enable us to identify you where applicable or necessary.
Contact Information: Address, email address, telephone number. Professional Information: Job title, company name.
Technical Information: IP address, browser type, and other online identifiers collected via cookies or similar technologies.
Other Information: Any additional personal data you voluntarily provide to us.

privacy-data.header: How We Collect Your Personal Data
privacy-data.description: We collect personal data in the following ways:
list_item: When you provide it directly to us (e.g., through contact forms or email inquiries).
Automatically through your use of our Website (e.g., via cookies or analytics tools).
From third parties authorized by you to share your personal data with us.

privacy-data.header: Purpose of Collection, Use, and Disclosure
privacy-data.description: We collect, use, and disclose your personal data for the following purposes:
list_item: To respond to your inquiries or requests.
To provide information about our services or products.
To improve our Website’s functionality and user experience.
To comply with legal obligations under applicable laws and regulations.
privacy-data.end_text: We will only use your personal data for these purposes or any other purposes that you have consented to or that are permitted under the PDPA.

privacy-data.description: We may disclose your personal data to:
list_item: Our employees and authorized third-party service providers who need access to perform their duties.
Regulatory authorities or law enforcement agencies where required by law.
Other third parties with your consent or as permitted under the PDPA.
privacy-data.end_text: We ensure that all third parties handling your personal data are bound by confidentiality obligations and comply with applicable data protection laws.

privacy-data.description: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined above or as required by law. Once it is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize your personal data.

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, collection, use, disclosure, copying, modification, disposal, or similar risks. These measures include:
list_item: Administrative safeguards such as staff training on PDPA compliance.
Technical safeguards such as encryption and up-to-date antivirus software.
Physical safeguards such as restricted access to work areas.

privacy-data.description: Under the PDPA, you have the right to:
list_item: Access your personal data held by us.
Correct inaccuracies in your personal data.
Withdraw consent for the collection, use, or disclosure of your personal data at any time by contacting us.
privacy-data.end_text: Please note that withdrawing consent may affect our ability to provide certain services to you.

privacy-data.description: Our Website uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience and analyze website traffic. By using our Website, you consent to our use of cookies in accordance with our Cookie Policy. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.
If we transfer your personal data outside Singapore, we will ensure that the recipient provides a standard of protection comparable to that under the PDPA unless exempted by applicable laws.

We may update this Privacy Notice from time to time to reflect changes in legal requirements or our business practices. The updated notice will be posted on our Website with the effective date indicated at the top.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Notice or wish to exercise your rights under the PDPA, please contact us at
privacy-data.end_text: This Privacy Notice ensures compliance with Singapore’s PDPA while providing transparency about how Oocidia handles personal data. It also includes provisions for cross-border transfers and cookie usage—important considerations for online businesses operating globally.
